formattedAddress: 1196 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1196 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128-0507, USA

originalText.text: This store hasn’t failed me yet. Each time I come in I’m leaving with something no matter what. They have all the clothing options you could imagine. On top of that the people that work there are the most welcoming and they know what they are talking about when it comes to style. Overall amazing store.

text.text: This store hasn’t failed me yet. Each time I come in I’m leaving with something no matter what. They have all the clothing options you could imagine. On top of that the people that work there are the most welcoming and they know what they are talking about when it comes to style. Overall amazing store.

originalText.text: Coolest store on Madison Ave! I love the kaws display and numerous selection of brands. My go to spot for drip on the upper east side. Oliver is always super helpful and helps me pick out dope looks. Will definitely be coming back soon

text.text: Coolest store on Madison Ave! I love the kaws display and numerous selection of brands. My go to spot for drip on the upper east side. Oliver is always super helpful and helps me pick out dope looks. Will definitely be coming back soon

originalText.text: Wish I could give infinite stars. Have only the best things to say!! Everything and everyone is amazing here - the atmosphere, the clothing, and especially the people. There is such a range of options - I’ve gotten everything from loungewear to NYE dresses. Can’t recommend it enough. I heart Zoey

text.text: Wish I could give infinite stars. Have only the best things to say!! Everything and everyone is amazing here - the atmosphere, the clothing, and especially the people. There is such a range of options - I’ve gotten everything from loungewear to NYE dresses. Can’t recommend it enough. I heart Zoey

originalText.text:
Blue & Cream on Madison Avenue has set the bar for a premier shopping experience. Every visit leaves me in awe not only of the carefully curated selection but also the exceptional customer service.

The ambiance of the store itself is chic and inviting, creating a pleasant environment for browsing through their unique collection. Every item in the store has been chosen with unmistakable intention, reflecting Jeff's keen eye for fashion. The carefully curated collection showcases a perfect blend of timeless elegance and contemporary flair. It's evident that the store's commitment to quality extends beyond individual pieces to the overall aesthetic, creating an atmosphere that exudes style and sophistication.

The intentional curation of the store extends beyond the merchandise to the overall ambiance. The layout and design create a seamless flow, making it a joy to explore the carefully arranged racks. The thoughtfulness put into every aspect of Blue and Cream contributes to an unparalleled shopping experience.

What sets Blue & Cream apart is not only the exceptional merchandise but also the exceptional customer service. If you get the chance to shop with Zoey, you are in luck. She always goes above and beyond in creating a personalized experience and knows how to find me the perfect pieces for every occasion. I am extremely picky when it comes to clothing, but Zoey is one of very few people that I trust. As an EH OG, the end of the summer has always been a sad time because where tf does Zoey go. BUT no need to be sad anymore because she is on Madison ave! Fletcher we love you too

Blue & Cream has earned every bit of its five-star rating through its intentional curation, exceptional service, and passion for providing customers with a truly unique shopping adventure. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Unique and stylish clothing with above-average quality and fashion-forward designs. The staff are always accommodating and super knowledgeable (the manager especially).
